Text:
function RYU_EP04_17()
    -- .転-3【12月第4週】「その欲望、解放しろ」
    SaveData.Title = "その欲望、解放しろ"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着・通常
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1061.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Wow, your body is totally beat up."
「いやー、見事にカラダがボロボロですね」]])

    MSG([[After coming back from the boys’ locker room. Akira watched me change from my uniform into casual clothes and said.
男子部から帰ってきたあと。
    　アキラは制服から私服に着替えるボクの様子を見つめて言った。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1253.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "I-Is it really that bad?"
「そ、そんなにヒドいかな」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1062.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Yeah, it’s terrible. You can hide it when you’re dressed, but when you take off your clothes it looks like you’ve been using an unfinished transformation system or something."
「いやヒドいでしょ。服を着てれば誤魔化せますけど、脱いだら未完成の変身システムでも使ったような有様ですよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1063.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "MY BODY IS FALLING APART!"
「オデノカラダハボドボドダー」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1254.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "What are you suddenly saying!?!?"
「急に何を言ってるの！？！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1064.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Ah, don’t mind me. It’s a spasm sometimes seen in tokusatsu fans."
「ああ、気にしないでください。特撮オタに時おり見られる発作です」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1065.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "But I’m really worried. You come home every day covered in bruises… what kind of hero are you?"
「でも心配なのは本当ですよ。毎日カラダをアザだらけにして帰ってきて……どこぞのヒーローですか、アナタは」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1066.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "It’s probably no use saying it, but please don’t overdo it. Seriously, it’s probably no use saying it."
「どうせ言っても無駄ですけど、無茶だけはしないようにお願いしますね。どうせ言っても無駄ですけど」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1255.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "You don’t have to say it twice..."
「二回言わなくても……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1067.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Do you listen the first time? You don’t even listen the second time."
「一回で言うこと聞くんですか？　二回でも聞かないくせに」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1256.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "I-I'm sorry... But Uran-san is pushing herself to the point of collapsing too."
「ご、ごめんなさい……でもね、ウランさんだって倒れちゃうくらいがんばってくれているから」]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1257.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "I guess I have to take some risks too."
「ボクも少しくらいの無茶はしないといけないな、って」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1068.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Generally speaking, being covered in bruises all over your body wouldn’t be called ‘taking some risks’."
「一般的には、全身がアザだらけの惨状を『少しくらいの無茶』とは言いませんけどね」]])

    MSG([[Still, Akira didn’t say more and backed off.
なんて言いつつも、アキラはそれ以上言わずに引き下がってくれる。]])

    MSG([[She knows full well that I won’t listen, but still says it.
ボクが言っても聞かないことを承知で言ってくれているんだよね。]])

    MSG([[I really feel sorry. But even so, I have to keep trying.
本当に申し訳ない。
    　ただそれでも、がんばらないといけないから。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1069.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "By the way, that Uran person—her tendency to ignore herself, overdo things, and her yandere side, somehow she’s similar to you, Minachin."
「それにしてもそのウランってヒト、自分を顧みないところとか、無茶し過ぎるところとか、ヤンデレなところとか、何だかミナちんと似てますよね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1258.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Y-Yandere!? What are you suddenly saying!"
「や、ヤンデレ！？　何を言い出しているの、急に！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1070.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "She’s unaware of it herself. Sneaking into the academy in disguise as a girl for her sister—if you put it positively it’s devotion, but negatively, that’s yandere."
「本人は無自覚なんですよねえ。姉のために女装で学園に潜入なんてできるのは、よく言えば一途、悪く言えばヤンデレでしょうに」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1071.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Maybe that’s why you two are drawn to each other? Yandere types attract one another, you know."
「でもだからこそアナタたち、惹かれ合っているんじゃないですか？　ヤンデレ同士は惹かれ合うんですなぁ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1259.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Don’t say it like it’s some Stand user ability."
「スタンド使いみたいに言わないでよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1072.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Anyway, setting that aside. Don’t you, Minachin and Uran-san, have any desires? When things get really tough, desire is what supports you first."
「まぁ余談はともかく。ミナちんもウランさんも、欲とかないんです？　本当にツラい時、まず支えになるのは欲望でしょう」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1260.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "D-Desire? If I talk about my desire, it’s just to wake up Marika-nee-san."
「よ、欲望？　ボクの欲望って言えば、マリカ姉さんを目覚めさせることだけど」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1073.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Doing something for someone else is different... More like, let’s release a desire that’s totally for yourself—like a totally selfish hobby thing."
「他の誰かのために行うのは何か違うんですよねー……もっとこう、趣味丸出しと言うか、自分のためだけの欲望を解放させましょうよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1074.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Wanting to be popular with girls. Wanting to play games all day. Wanting to beat Pikakin in subscriber count. Don’t you have something like that?"
「女の子にモテたいとか。一日中ゲームだけしてたいとか。チャンネル登録者数でピカキンに勝ちたいとか。そういうのないんです？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1261.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "H-Hmm... Ah, maybe I want a dishwasher. One with a drying function."
「う、うーん……あ、食器洗浄機が欲しいかも。乾燥機能がついているヤツ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1075.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Are you a mom? You should be looking for something more like a male student... geez."
「子持ちの主婦ですか、アナタは。もっと男子学生らしいのを求めているのに……まったく」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1076.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Well, it might not come to you right away, but think about it again. Minachin should live more for yourself."
「まぁすぐには見つからないかもですけど、また考えてみてください。ミナちんはもっと、自分のための人生を送るべきなんですから」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1262.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 "My desires, huh."
「ボクの欲望、か」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[It seems unlikely to find them easily.
簡単には見つかりそうにない。]])

    MSG([[Thinking it over, I realized that until now, my life was all about chasing after Marika-nee-san. I had never thought about any other desires.
よくよく考えてみると、ボクのこれまでの人生はマリカ姉さんを追いかけるばかりで、それ以外の欲望なんて考えたことがなかった。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1263.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
 (If it were Uran-san… I wonder what she would say.)
（ウランさんだったら……一体なんて答えるかな）]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[If it’s someone like Uran-san who’s similar to me, what would her answer be? I thought maybe I’d ask if I get the chance.
自分と似たウランさんならなんと答えるだろうか。
    　また機会があれば聞いてみようと思った。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_18")
end
